mapper.sql: userId, username, password, phone, registerDate, avatar, description, sex, age, skinType, acneTimeSpan, level, available
mapper.insert: insert into t_acne_article (acneUserId, articleId, viewTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE viewTime = now()

insert into t_acne_user (userId, username, password, phone registerDate, avatar, description, sex, age, skinType, acneTimeSpan, level, available ) values (#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skintype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acnetimespan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update t_acne_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
